EditableMicrocosmAPI

Creates an instance of the EditableMicrocosmAPI class. This permits edit (create, patch, update, delete) operations on the Microcosm.

Example

Extends

  • MicrocosmAPI

Constructors

new EditableMicrocosmAPI(__namedParameters, telemetry)

new EditableMicrocosmAPI(__namedParameters, telemetry?): EditableMicrocosmAPI

Creates a new Microcosm

• __namedParameters: MicrocosmAPIConfig

• telemetry?: BaseTelemetry

Returns
